text: The Impulse to Progress and Democracy () is a political party in Benin. At the last legislative elections, 30 March 2003, the party was member of the Presidential Movement, the alliance of supporters of Mathieu Kérékou, who had won the 2001 presidential elections, and won 2 out of 83 seats. Category:Political parties in Benin Category:Political parties with year of establishment missing
title: Impulse to Progress and Democracy
